talk.author: did:plc:xpeyaxormuubyxygx42noogv
talk.utter: I can talk less in Lojban if you want. I often take the few opportunities I get to use it, but if you'd rather me not, I won't.

talk.author: did:plc:edzlnzvoztauuygch4z5fvl3
talk.utter: It's a nice challenging puzzle. If I get anything wrong, please do tell me because I want all the feedback I can get.

talk.author: did:plc:xpeyaxormuubyxygx42noogv
talk.utter: Good to know, it can be very fun! I won't hesitate when I see or suspect an error.
